Name: Juice Mania
About the game: Maria is fed up with fast foods and sodas! So she opens a juice bar to introduce her city to a better class of refreshments. Play this gorgeous Match-3 game aand help Maria to build up juice bar from a simple stand on the street to the hippest hang out in town... the orders come quickly as you match pieces of fruit in groups of three or more to make the drinks your customers want! Break your junk food habit today with deliciously fun fruit-matching thrills! A great mix between Time Management and Match3!
